title: Recommended reading from 4chan's /pol/ in azw3
description:
Image containing the collection: http://i.imgur.com/tF7WWuR.jpg

Image of folder hierarchy (only shows 92 out of 96 included folders): http://i.imgur.com/pxNrvAU.png

I found 96 books of the 101 listed. The following books could not be found:

Mark Mazower - Hitler's Empire
Walker Connor - Ethnonationalism
Peter Christian - The Work of All Ages
Thomas Dalton - Debating the Holocaust
Franz Borkenau - The Spanish Cockpit


In addition, the following 9 books were only found in pdf and converted poorly to epub/azw3, thus, they have been left as pdfs in all collections:

Albert Speer - Inside the Third Reich
Geoffery Till - Seapower
Tatu Vanhanen - Ethnic Conflicts Explained by Ethnic Nepotism
Viktor Suvorov - The Liberators
Viktor Suvorov - Aquarium
Leszek Kolakowski - Main Currents of Marxism
Petr Alekseevich Kropotkin - The State: Its Historic Role
Germar Rudolf - Lectures on the Holocaust: Controversial Issues Cross Examined
Don Heddesheimer - The First Holocaust. Jewish Fund Raising Campaigns With Holocaust Claims During and After World War
